head.title: Continuum SF Innovation and Credit Conference

header.language: 中文

home.headline: Build Business Across the Pacific
home.describe: Take your company global by networking with over 1,000 venture capitalists, entrepreneurs, and government officials from China and the U.S. Learn what it takes to build a Transpacific business; create opportunities at ContinuumSF.
home.subSectionCopy: The Conference will focus on Innovation and Fin-Tech Credit:
home.techCopy: Innovation Technology: will feature c-level executives sharing their perspectives on trends in innovation across industries including innovation in real-estate, IOT, medical devices, education, and cloud security. Throughout the duration of the conference, companies will be feature their newly emerging products and services at tables and booths located throughout the venue.
home.servicesCopy: CREDIT: will feature top leaders from Internet Finance and credit presenting their ideas of areas of big data, credit reporting, risk management, etc. Topics include: Sino-US collaboration in marketplace lending & credit; the start of China’s credit and the potential for Sino-U.S. opportunity; Synchronized development between the traditional industry and the Internet Finance; The balance between innovation & risk management of Internet Finance; Legal support of cross-order investment.

sponsor.h1Copy: If you are interested in sponsoring, please email, or call us at 1 415 352 8837.
sponsor.h2Copy: Showcase your company to over 1,000 business professionals from the U.S. and China. Booths are limited, so register and guarantee your spot today!
sponsor.boothCopy: More space and a great display means more attention from a busy audience. Includes pipe-and-drape, a large table and chairs, Wifi and lunch vouchers for both days.
sponsor.tableCopy: Showcase your company to 1,000 visitors from around the world with a stunning table display. Includes a large table, chairs, Wifi access and lunch vouchers for both days.

locate.venueCopy1: Pier 27 James R. Herman Cruise Terminal
locate.visaCopy: Learn how to obtain a United States Visa.

about.h1Copy: In an effort to promote Chinese and San Francisco’s cross-border development, science and cultural exchange, and thanks to the generous help and support of San Francisco’s Friendship Cities in China as well as the San Francisco Chamber of Commerce, on January 27th and 28th, ChinaSF will host San Francisco’s first ever Innovation and Credit Exposition. The Exposition will focus on cutting-edge topics in innovation, as well as the current trends in US-China cooperation across industries. Come hear from c-level executives across different fields share their perspectives on innovation and opportunities for development and investment, introduce all elements of innovation permeating across the largest industries, and how those are boosting investment and development.
about.chinaSFCopy: ChinaSF is a bridge between San Francisco and China. Since 2008, ChinaSF brought over 50 companies and created more than 350 jobs in the San Francisco Bay Area by supporting Chinese companies and investors. Through its offices in Beijing, Shanghai and San Francisco, ChinaSF guides Bay Area companies looking to expand into the Greater China region. ChinaSF is a joint venture between the Office of the Mayor and the San Francisco Center for Economic Development.
about.syncusCopy: SyncUS International is a professional business service company with specific focuses on Sino-U.S. business connection in Internet Finance industry, which includes marketplace lending, credit reporting and FinTech. SyncUS tailors solutions for Chinese entrepreneurs, investors and leading professionals who want to make cross border investment, seek global collaboration opportunities, increase business presence and set up business networks in the United States. Meanwhile, SyncUS also partners with top-tier U.S. FinTech companies and service providers to find suitable Chinese customers, partners and investors. SyncUS cooperates with a number of industry conferences and exhibitions to provide more value-adding services. Our vision is to act as the most reliable and professional platform to bridge the Sino-U.S. Internet Finance industry.
